actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend section 202 of the Housing Act of 1959 and section 8 of the United States Housing Act of 1937 for the purpose of providing assistance to mobile home projects to be used as residences for the elderly or handicapped families.

summary.text: Amends the Housing Act of 1959 to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to make loans for rental or cooperative mobile home projects for elderly or handicapped families.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 202 of the Housing Act of 1959 and section 8 of the United States Housing Act of 1937 for the purpose of providing assistance to mobile home projects to be used as residences for the elderly or handicapped families.
